channel.title: How do I center my Horizontal list (DROP MENU)
channel.description: Nvm, I'll just do like I should, I attempted a project that was past my experience as a web developer. I'll start one soon though, be back soon ;)!

item.title: How do I center my Horizontal list (DROP MENU)

still doesn’t work, and I’m using firefox by the way.
[/quote]What you’re using shouldn’t matter ;]

Margin auto doesnt work in ie6 unless you have text align center in the right places.[/quote]No, I mean, he shouldn’t worry about what browsers work because he should code for all of them

item.title: How do I center my Horizontal list (DROP MENU)
item.dc:creator: @belbn belbn
item.description:
@belbn wrote:

This worked for me:

#nav{height: 19px; text-align: center; margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;width:400px;}

Just manually measure the width of it, 400 is a guess.

Also for ie6 you may need to use some crazy shit, google it m8.

Read full topic
